titleStmt.title: Conspiracie against kings, heauens scorne A sermon preached at Westminster-Abbey before the iudges, vpon the fifth of Nouemb. 1622. By Ro: Willan, Doctor in Diuinity.
titleStmt.author: Willan, Robert, d. 1630.

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A" in a mortised ornament.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
